title: 手机or电脑
author: BiggayJN
txt_content:
大家平常回复帖子用什么方式呢？
你们是觉得电脑回起来舒服
还是手机用起来方便呢，欢迎大家来投票！

replies.author: 专刀你
replies.txt_content: 手机呀，

replies.author: 我是人1012
replies.txt_content: 秒木板

replies.author: 安逸An_Yi
replies.txt_content: 当蓝是发光的木板啦

replies.author: 0-zero-0
replies.txt_content: 电脑舒服，抢锭快，水回复也快

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 就冲这副手我就选电脑

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 肯定是电脑，手机太难受了

replies.author: Volta_X
replies.txt_content: 平板呢

replies.author: xiao_晨
replies.txt_content: 电脑真苏福

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 我是没有电脑啊。。。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 你的下一台电脑，何必是电脑（

replies.author: BiggayJN
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-4-7 18:27
你的下一台电脑，何必是电脑（
大佬打字打错了语序不通

replies.author: 阿灬秋
replies.txt_content: 两个一起用不香吗

replies.author: BiggayJN
replies.txt_content:
阿秋Minecraft 发表于 2020-4-7 18:36
两个一起用不香吗
我就是

replies.author: StBruce
replies.txt_content: 习惯电脑了所以就不换了

replies.author: Sdrkey
replies.txt_content: 我应该是两者都用+发光的木板才对

replies.author: 自闭君
replies.txt_content: 手表（滑稽）
发光的木板到底是什么？

replies.author: fhjx
replies.txt_content: 当然用电脑玩
电脑舒服但是两种都用

replies.author: Drowned64
replies.txt_content: 与村民交易的痛只有手机玩家知道

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content: 电脑特别舒服！

replies.author: LzQuarter
replies.txt_content: 第四个选项当然应该是3种都用

replies.author: 在下晴天
replies.txt_content:
手机加木板
表示还是电脑比较好，但是
手机方便。。。

replies.author: lmy23333
replies.txt_content: 电脑，我没有手机

replies.author: 让你嘿嘿嘿
replies.txt_content: 电脑最舒服

replies.author: 66666666的66
replies.txt_content: 手机界面很难受

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 手机可以用电脑版，电脑不能用手机版

replies.author: EGEE2468
replies.txt_content: .....手表手环电视不能吗？开玩笑我习惯电脑手机也要用电脑版的...

replies.author: 时空寻觅者
replies.txt_content: 电脑打字十指 手机就两指 你自己想

replies.author: 502mc
replies.txt_content: 当然我选择电脑，手机版问题略多

replies.author: 淡淡的星空
replies.txt_content: 果断选木板
